document.full_text: the division of authority between the two leaders has seemed to work smoothly for the past three years, but it has recently shown signs of breaking down.
document.title: memo from moscow: bulldogs under the rug? signs of a putin-medvedev rift
lines_and_colors: the division of authority between the two leaders has seemed to work smoothly for the past three years, but it has recently shown signs of breaking down.
